item.title: Fri 15 December 2023: Celebrating the life and work of Benjamin Zephaniah
item.description: DETAILS: Theme: Celebrating the life and work of Benjamin Zephaniah 15 December 2023 9.30 PM WAT/CET Duration: ca. 121 minutes Watch party: https://stream.provo.lol Let’s celebrate the life and work of the legendary poet and activist Benjamin Zephaniah (1958–2023). b.y.o.b. + b.y.o. ✊
